scripts.build: ng build --aot --prod --build-optimizer && cd dist/provider && ren index.html provider.ejs && move /Y C:\Users\user\WebstormProjects\deliveries\delivery\provider\dist\provider\provider.ejs C:\Users\user\WebstormProjects\deliveries\delivery\beakend\views
scripts.buildMac: ng build --aot --prod --build-optimizer && cd dist/provider && mv index.html provider.ejs && mv /Users/tymofiiyuzefovych/Desktop/gitlab/wisechoice/provider/dist/provider/provider.ejs /Users/tymofiiyuzefovych/Desktop/gitlab/wisechoice/beakend/views
scripts.build-linux-test: ng build --aot --configuration=test --build-optimizer && mv dist/provider/index.html dist/provider/provider.ejs && cp -r dist/provider/provider.ejs ../beakend/views
scripts.build-linux-prod: ng build --aot --prod --build-optimizer && mv dist/provider/index.html dist/provider/provider.ejs && cp -r dist/provider/provider.ejs ../beakend/views
